member.name: T:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler
member.summary: Handles assembly-related operations such as loading, scanning for extensions, and managing driver configurations.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current domain in which the assembly is executed.

member.summary: Logging interface for tracking activities and errors.

member.summary: Scans and initializes loader extensions within a given assembly representation.
member.param: The assemblies_rep object representing the assembly to be scanned.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.ScanExtensions
member.summary: Scans and initializes loader extensions within a given .NET Assembly object.
member.param: The Assembly object to be scanned.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetExtensionScanners(System.IProgress{TheTechIdea.Beep.Addin.PassedArgs},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Loads assemblies from a specified path and scans them for extension scanners, reporting progress through IProgress.
member.param: The progress reporting mechanism.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetBuiltinClasses
member.summary: Scans the current executing assembly and the root assembly for built-in classes.
member.returns: Returns an IErrorsInfo object indicating the success or failure of the operation.

member.summary: This Method will go through all Folders ProjectClass,OtherDLL,Addin, Drivers and load DLL

member.summary: Method Will Load All Assembly found in the Passed Path

member.summary: Method Will Load All Assembly found in the Passed Path

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.RearrangeAddin(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rearranges or adds a new addin object to the function hierarchy.
member.param: The ID of the addin object.
The parent ID of the addin object. Null if it's a root object.
The type of the object.
member.returns: Returns a new or existing ParentChildObject based on the input parameters.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetAddinObjects(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Retrieves addin objects from the specified assembly and organizes them into a hierarchical structure.
member.param: The assembly to scan for addin objects.
member.returns: A list of ParentChildObjects representing the hierarchical structure of addins.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetAddinObjectsFromTree
member.summary: Retrieves addin objects from the addin tree structure defined in the configuration editor.
member.returns: A list of ParentChildObjects representing the addins organized in a hierarchical structure.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.ScanAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Scans an assembly to identify various implementations like data sources, loader extensions, workflow actions, and more.
member.param: The assembly to scan.
member.returns: Returns true if the scanning is successful, otherwise false.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetAssemblyClassDefinition(System.Reflection.TypeInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the definition of a class within an assembly, including metadata and methods.
member.param: TypeInfo object of the class.
The name of the type being defined.
member.returns: Returns an AssemblyClassDefinition object containing class details.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.SendMessege(System.IProgress{TheTechIdea.Beep.Addin.PassedArgs},System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a progress update message.
member.param: The progress reporter to report the message.
A cancellation token for the task.
The message to be sent. Default is null.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.CreateInstanceFromString(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of a class from its type name.
member.param: The fully qualified name of the type.
Arguments for the type constructor.
member.returns: An instance of the specified type or null if the type cannot be created.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.CreateInstanceFromString(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of a class from its type name within a specific assembly.
member.param: The name of the DLL containing the type.
The fully qualified name of the type.
Arguments for the type constructor.
member.returns: An instance of the specified type or null if the type cannot be created.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve(System.Object,System.ResolveEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the assembly resolution for the current application domain.
member.param: The sender of the event.
Arguments related to the assembly resolve event.
member.returns: The resolved assembly or null if the assembly cannot be resolved.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetInstance(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a type specified by a fully qualified name.
member.param: The fully qualified name of the type.
member.returns: An instance of the specified type or null if the type cannot be instantiated.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a type by its fully qualified name.
member.param: The fully qualified name of the type.
member.returns: The type corresponding to the name, or null if it cannot be found.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.CheckDriverAlreadyExistinList
member.summary: Checks and updates the list of driver configurations to ensure no duplicates exist.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetADOTypeDrivers(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Extracts and configures ADO.NET type driver information from an assembly.
member.param: The assembly to scan for ADO.NET drivers.
member.returns: True if drivers are successfully extracted, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.GetDrivers(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of driver configurations from an assembly.

member.summary: Creates a list of file extensions supported by the data sources.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler.AddEngineDefaultDrivers
member.summary: Adds default engine drivers to the driver configurations.
member.returns: True if default drivers are successfully added, false otherwise.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
member.param: Indicates whether the method call comes from a Dispose method (its value is true) or from a finalizer (its value is false).

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
